addDialog.confirmSvgDesc: Are you sure you want to use SVG images? To avoid XSS and XXE attacks, Lemon New Tab will process the image, so it may cause the SVG image not to be displayed as expected. But even after processing, you may still be attacked by the image you choose, so make sure the image source you use is safe.
addDialog.invalidUrlError: Invalid URL. Please input a new one
addDialog.title: Title
addDialog.tooLargeImageError: The image size exceeds 100KiB, please reselect a new one~
addDialog.uploadFaviconAlert: Available types: ico, svg, png, jpg, webp

sponsor: I first built this extension in my free time to meet my own needs, and I’m glad it’s useful for you too! If you’d like to support me, you can reach me at: redlnn@outlook.com. Thanks for your support!
title: New Tab
